Package com.sun.spot.security.implementation.ecc

This package contains the implementation specific classes for elliptic curve cryptography, which are not part of the SATSA specificiation.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ECCurve This ECCurve class contains functions that operate on ECPoint's and to do point multiplication.
ECCurveFp This ECCurveFp class implements elliptic curve over prime fields:
y^2 == x^3 + a*x + b
ECPoint This ECPoint class is the representation of a point on an elliptic curve.
FFA The FFA class is a simple and fast big-integer implementation suited for public key cryptography.
FiniteField This FiniteField class operates on integer arrays, but interprets them as elements of a finite field.
NIST160PrimeField This NIST160PrimeField class implements efficient reduction for the prime field with NIST 160-bit reduction modulus.
PrimeField Implementation of prime field arithmetics.
 

Package com.sun.spot.security.implementation.ecc Description

This package contains the implementation specific classes for elliptic curve cryptography, which are not part of the SATSA specificiation.

This classes are also part of the Squawk class library, the corresponding package name is com.sun.squawk.security.ecc. As the Squawk classes are currently not visible they are duplicated in this package. In future versions of the library this package may be removed and the Squawk classes will be used directly.

The classes in this package are a slightly newer version than the corresponding classes in Squawk, the main difference is that a simple modulo exponentiation algorithm was added.

Furthermore do the Squawk classes not include the FiniteField class.
